reviewText: I so did not expect for my blu-ray of Hunger games to be blocked and not able to watch it. I had to look it up because I didn't even know what it was. Please send me a Blu-ray from the United states, so I can watch my movie
Used collection was from the UK so my Blu-ray player's region doesn't match up. It's a nice paper weight though

This set came from overseas and does not play on my DVD player.  I did not realize that at the time.  Now it is going to cost more to send them back then what I paid for the movies so I will lose money.  So I am not happy with this.
Very disappointed. Did not know this DVD was in PAL format. My NTSC format DVD player cannot read it. So it is useless. The format was not in the title or description.

DON'T BUY THIS VERSION OF THE HUNGER GAMES IF YOU ARE IN THE US. This version won't play on my LG dvd player because it is a European version. The company WILL NOT refund your money if you purchase accidentally. You will be screwed. I don't know why Amazon is selling this on the US version of Amazon because obviously people are getting stuck with this useless set. What a waste. Very angry.
What the hell Blue rays are supposed to be region free! Why buy a region coded blue ray, is not worth it.
This was a waste of my money did not play. Kept getting error message.
READ DESCRIPTION CAREFULLY! This will NOT play on United States DVD/Bluray players! Don't be fooled by the good price!
Not one of them played in the blue ray DVD player.
I collect movies that I like and would see again.  This is one of them.  Product came as advertised and on time.  Highly recommend this product and the vendor!  i would buy again!
